mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wiki_catalog(wiki_id, article_id, title, level, parent_id, sort, create_time, update_time, is_deleted) VALUES (#{wikiId}, #{articleId}, #{title}, #{level}, #{parentId}, #{sort}, now(), now(), 0)

INSERT INTO wiki_catalog(wiki_id, article_id, title, level, parent_id, sort, create_time, update_time, is_deleted) VALUES
(#{catalog.wikiId}, #{catalog.articleId}, #{catalog.title}, #{catalog.level}, #{catalog.parentId}, #{catalog.sort}, now(), now(), 0)
mapper.select: select id, wiki_id, article_id, title, level, parent_id, sort, create_time, update_time, is_deleted from wiki_catalog where is_deleted = 0 and wiki_id = #{wikiId}

select id, wiki_id, article_id, title, level, parent_id, sort, create_time, update_time, is_deleted from wiki_catalog where is_deleted = 0 and wiki_id = #{wikiId} and article_id != null and level = 2 order by id limit 1

select id, wiki_id, article_id, title, level, parent_id, sort, create_time, update_time, is_deleted from wiki_catalog where is_deleted = 0 and wiki_id = #{wikiId} and article_id != null and id > #{catalogId} order by id asc limit 1

select id, wiki_id, article_id, title, level, parent_id, sort, create_time, update_time, is_deleted from wiki_catalog where is_deleted = 0 and wiki_id = #{wikiId} and article_id != null and id < #{catalogId} order by id desc limit 1
